paper_abstract: This paper presents an overview of the workshop MARTES on Modeling and Analysis of Real-time and Embedded Systems that has taken place for the first time in association with the MODELS/UML 2005 conference. The main themes discussed at this workshop concerned (1) methodologies and tools for quantitative analysis and (2) methodologies and languages for modeling quantitative aspects of real-time and embedded systems in the context of model driven development.
paper_title: Modeling and analysis of real-time and embedded systems
